attributes.action: Empty public buildings used to shelter homeless. End fines and disposal of goods
attributes.background: Al over the country homeless are moved on, fined amd belongings confiscated. No empathy is shown. In the depths of Winter, in a supposedly civilised society and one of the richest countries in the world, how can this treatment of fellow human beings be allowed to continue ?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
